flowLogsEnabled.description: Indicates whether flow logs are enabled. Defaults to `false`. Valid values: `true`, `false`.

flowLogsS3Bucket.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket for the flow logs. Required if `flow_logs_enabled` is `true`.

flowLogsS3Prefix.description: The prefix for the location in the Amazon S3 bucket for the flow logs. Required if `flow_logs_enabled` is `true`.
